    • Method Detail

      • removeInfoForTerm

        public int removeInfoForTerm​(java.lang.String term)
        Remove all of the information describing a particular term. The state of the system should be the same as if this term had never been added in the first place.
        Parameters:
        term - string describing the term, e.g.; "Fall 2017"
        Returns:
        negative if term not found

      • addLetterGrade

        public int addLetterGrade​(java.lang.String term,
                          java.lang.String lettergrade)
        Add a letter grade to the list
        Parameters:
        term - string describing the term, e.g.; "Fall 2017"
        lettergrade - a grade letter, such as "B+"
        Returns:
        negative on failure

      • addNumericGrade

        public int addNumericGrade​(java.lang.String term,
                           int percentageGrade)
        Add a numeric grade to the list
        Parameters:
        term - string describing the term, e.g.; "Fall 2017"
        percentageGrade - a numeric grade, such as 78 (percent)
        Returns:
        negative on failure

      • getTermGPA

        public float getTermGPA​(java.lang.String term)
        Access the internally managed state for the grade point average. Should return the GPA (mean) for the indicated term.
        Parameters:
        term - string describing the term, e.g.; "Fall 2017"
        Returns:
        GPA calculated for the matching term

      • getOverallGPA

        public float getOverallGPA()
        Access the internally managed state for the grade point average. Should return the GPA (mean) for all courses across all terms.
        Returns:
        overall GPA, calculated across all terms
